title: Marinated lamb neck with roasted potatoes and tomatoes
description: Lamb neck is a cheaper cut which is usually slow cooked, but here José uses a marinade to tenderise the meat and serves it medium-rare.
ingredients: 5 tbsp olive oil, plus extra to serve
600g/1lb 5oz ripe tomatoes on the vine, halved
2 waxy potatoes, such as desirée, peeled and sliced into 6–8mm thick rounds
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
